snippet: The governing body of international wrestling announced in Lausanne, Switzerland, that the sport’s yellow-and-red mats would be replaced with dark-blue-and-orange mats.
abstract: United World Wrestling updates mats and uniforms for both wrestlers and referees.
lead_paragraph: The governing body of international wrestling announced in Lausanne, Switzerland, that the sport’s yellow-and-red mats would be replaced with dark-blue-and-orange mats.

headline.main: Wrestling to Adopt a New Palette
